title:
Philips Sonicare 4100 Power Toothbrush, Rechargeable Electric Toothbrush with Pressure Sensor, Black HX3681/24, removes up to 3x more plaque vs. a manual toothbrush, signals when your 2 minutes is up,
pressure sensor to prevent gun recession, includes 1 electric toothbrush, 1 SymplyClean brush head, 1 USB charger (without wall adaptor),
descriptions:
**Product Listing: Philips Sonicare 4100 Power Toothbrush**

- Model Number: HX3681/24
- Type: Rechargeable Electric Toothbrush
- Color: Black
- Plaque Removal Efficiency: 3x more plaque vs. a manual toothbrush
- Technology: Sonicare
- Cleaning Time: 2 minutes
- Features:
  - Pressure Sensor: Yes
  - QuadPacer: Yes
  - SmarTimer: Yes
  - Intensity Settings: 2 levels
- Design: Slim ergonomic
- Head Shape: Familiar
- Included Items:
  - Electric Toothbrush: 1
  - Brush Head: SimplyClean (C1), Quantity: 1
  - USB Charger: Quantity: 1, Wall Adaptor: Not included

The Philips Sonicare 4100 Power Toothbrush is a rechargeable electric toothbrush that provides superior plaque removal efficiency, giving you a cleaner and healthier mouth. With Sonicare technology, this toothbrush delivers a powerful yet gentle clean. The brushing time is set at 2 minutes, ensuring thorough cleaning every time.

This toothbrush is equipped with advanced features to enhance your brushing experience. The pressure sensor alerts you when you are applying too much pressure, preventing gum recession. The QuadPacer feature notifies you when it's time to move to a different section of your mouth, ensuring even cleaning. The SmarTimer helps you achieve the recommended brushing time of 2 minutes.

Designed with a slim ergonomic handle and a familiar-shaped head, this toothbrush is comfortable to hold and maneuver, reaching even the hard-to-reach areas of your mouth. The included brush head, SimplyClean (C1), provides optimal cleaning performance.

The package includes one Philips Sonicare 4100 Power Toothbrush, one SimplyClean (C1) brush head, and one USB charger. Please note that the wall adaptor is not included.

Upgrade your oral care routine with the Philips Sonicare 4100 Power Toothbrush and achieve a cleaner, healthier smile.

Product Listing:

Introducing the Philips Sonicare 4100 Power Toothbrush, the ultimate solution for a brighter and healthier smile. This rechargeable electric toothbrush is designed to provide superior plaque removal efficiency, offering 3 times more plaque removal compared to a manual toothbrush. With Sonicare technology, this toothbrush delivers exceptional cleaning power for a thorough and effective clean.

Featuring a sleek black color, the Philips Sonicare 4100 Power Toothbrush is not only powerful but also stylish. Its slim ergonomic design ensures a comfortable grip, making every brushing session a breeze. The familiar-shaped head allows for easy maneuverability and precision cleaning.

With a built-in pressure sensor, QuadPacer, and SmarTimer, this toothbrush ensures optimal brushing experience. The pressure sensor alerts you when you are brushing too hard, helping to prevent gum recession. The QuadPacer feature notifies you when it's time to move to the next mouth section, ensuring equal cleaning time for each quadrant. The SmarTimer ensures that you brush for the recommended 2 minutes, guaranteeing a thorough clean every time.

The Philips Sonicare 4100 Power Toothbrush offers 2 intensity settings, allowing you to customize your brushing experience according to your preference. Whether you prefer a gentle clean or a more intense scrub, this toothbrush has got you covered.

This kit includes everything you need for a complete oral care routine. It comes with 1 Philips Sonicare 3100 Electric Toothbrush, 1 SimplyClean (C1) Brush Head for optimal cleaning, and 1 USB Charger. Please note that the wall adaptor is not included.

Upgrade your dental hygiene routine with the Philips Sonicare 4100 Power Toothbrush. Experience the power of Sonicare technology and enjoy a cleaner, healthier smile.

**Product Listing: Philips Sonicare 4100 Power Toothbrush**

The Philips Sonicare 4100 Power Toothbrush is a rechargeable electric toothbrush that provides a superior clean compared to a manual toothbrush. With its Sonicare technology, this toothbrush removes up to 3 times more plaque, ensuring a thorough and effective cleaning experience.

Key Features:
- Pressure Sensor: The built-in pressure sensor alerts you if you are applying too much pressure while brushing, helping to prevent gum recession.
- QuadPacer: This toothbrush features an optimal time notification for each mouth section, ensuring that you spend enough time cleaning every area of your mouth.
- SmarTimer: The 2-minute timer ensures that you brush for the dentist-recommended time, promoting better oral health.
- 2 Intensity Settings: Choose between two intensity levels to customize your brushing experience.
- Slim Ergonomic Design: The slim and ergonomic design of this toothbrush makes it comfortable to hold and easy to maneuver.
- Familiar-shaped Head: The head shape of this toothbrush is familiar and user-friendly, ensuring a comfortable brushing experience.

Included Items:
- Electric Toothbrush: 1 Philips Sonicare 3100 model is included in the kit.
- Brush Head: 1 SimplyClean (C1) brush head is included for effective plaque removal.
- USB Charger: The kit includes 1 USB charger for convenient charging. Please note that a wall adaptor is not included.

Experience the power and effectiveness of the Philips Sonicare 4100 Power Toothbrush for a cleaner and healthier smile. Upgrade your oral care routine today!
